name: 7000 Days Left...
description:
7000 days left is a game where you have just 7305 (in-game; 5 real-time hours) days to colonize the solar system before the sun explodes.

This game features a close-to-accurate representation of the Solar System; Multiple planets to fly to and colonize, and a 'realistic' date and time system.

7000 days left is in extremely early alpha. It may be filled with glitches and doesn't even have an ending yet! It is also a side project worked on only by Tim while we focus most of our efforts on Trial of Gaia. We will keep you posted on updates in the devlog.

cheat codes:

1. uuddlrlrbas - Infinite Money

2. uudduudduus - Accelerate Time (only works on 10x speed)
